unnormalised: Arre yaar, kiteak soglle zonn taka "Mr." mhonnun ulo kortat? To fokot 20 vorsancho asa, taka "bhai" tori mhonn! "Beta" title-ui borem dista, lol.
normalised: Arre yaar, kiteak soglle zonn taka "Mister" mhunntat? To fokot vis vorsancho asa, taka "bhai" tori mhunn! "Beta" tori borem dista, L-O-L.
text: Arre yaar, kiteak soglle zonn taka "Mr." mhonnun ulo kortat? To fokot 20 vorsancho asa, taka "bhai" tori mhonn! "Beta" title-ui borem dista, lol.
